items.content_html: i18n-light is a lightweight internationalization package that offers a simple and efficient way to manage translations in your project. It allows you to translate text using keys, without the additional overhead and complexity found in full-fledged i18n libraries.
items.title: MsudMthr/i18n-light: i18n-light is a lightweight internationalization package that offers a simple and efficient way to manage translations in your project. It allows you to translate text using keys, without the additional overhead and complexity found in full-fledged i18n libraries.

items.content_html: EMS is a simple frontend project built with React that provides an easy-to-use interface for managing employee data. The application uses local storage to store and retrieve employee information, making it a lightweight solution for handling employee records without the need for a backend.
items.title: HG-75/EMS: EMS is a simple frontend project built with React that provides an easy-to-use interface for managing employee data. The application uses local storage to store and retrieve employee information, making it a lightweight solution for handling employee records without the need for a backend.
